ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: Some MS students (Cropping Systems course of the University of Milan) supported data collection and analysis. They are not listed as authors because they did not participate in structuring the work, as well in analysis of results and in finalizing the study, but we wish to acknowledge their support and commitment. They are: M. Caprioglio, D. Corsini, G. Frigerio, A. Improta, F. Invernizzi, A. Landi, T. Marzorati, S. Minella, A. Pilenga, M. Signorelli, A. Sinetti, D.M. Torrente, I. Vigevani.
